hero.name: Ismail Ali
hero.tagline: Designing fast, responsive, and user-friendly websites that bring ideas to life.

about.about_description: I'm a passionate Frontend and WordPress Developer with a Master's degree in Information Technology. With over a year of professional experience, I specialize in creating modern, responsive websites that deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.about_journey: My journey in web development began with a strong foundation in computer science, and I've since honed my skills in React.js, WordPress, and modern web technologies. I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient code and beautiful user interfaces.
about.about_current: Currently working at Appiesoft Web Solutions, I'm focused on expanding my expertise and seeking opportunities to work internationally, particularly in Europe and the UAE, where I can contribute to innovative projects and grow as a developer.

footer.aboutText: Frontend & WordPress Developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences that make a difference.
